title: Create pricing plans interface with static PIX QR code payment

requirements.text: Create a pricing plans page displaying subscription tiers (Basic, Premium, etc.) with visual cards showing price, benefits, and feature lists for each plan

quotes: criE uma interface visual dos planos

acceptanceCriteria: Pricing plans page accessible from home page navigation
Each plan displayed as a distinct card with clear visual hierarchy
Plan details include price, benefits list, and feature comparison
Cards are responsive and work on mobile devices

requirements.text: Generate a static PIX QR code image using the email key 'proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com' and display it prominently on the pricing plans page

quotes: implemente o qr code pix estatico com a seguinte chave de email: proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: QR code displayed as a static image on pricing plans page
QR code is clearly visible and scannable on mobile devices
Email key 'proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com' is shown as text alongside QR code
Payment instructions in Portuguese are displayed near the QR code

requirements.text: Add payment instructions section explaining how to complete PIX payment using the QR code, including steps for scanning and confirming the transaction
acceptanceCriteria: Clear step-by-step payment instructions in Portuguese
Instructions include how to scan QR code and verify payment details
Contact information or support guidance for payment issues is provided

constraints: No real payment processing or verification - PIX payments must be verified manually
QR code must be static - no dynamic generation
Use existing Layout component with back/home navigation buttons
Maintain Portuguese language for all user-facing text

required: Static PIX QR code for email key proj.defdriver+pagbank@gmail.com (pix-qr-code.dim_400x400.png)
